name: Puzzle marathon
description:
Match 3 or more of the same kind. Simple match puzzle game.

You use your mouse to drag the blocks up, down, left and right and it cost a move. You have a total of 250 moves till the game ends. It will will appear new blocks at 50 moves, 100 moves and 200 moves, while a new block appears it will be a bit harder to find a matches. Match 5 alike you get a bomb that you can use to wipe out 5*5 blocks.
